body: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #1e1e1e; color: #e0e0e0; margin: 0; padding: 0; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh;
container: width: 80%; max-width: 800px; background-color: #2e2e2e; border-radius: 8px; padding: 20px; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
